thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Berekum Chelsea transfer Hearts-target Latif Salifu to Ivorian champions AS Tanda
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Berekum Chelsea transfer Hearts-target Latif Salifu to Ivorian champions AS Tanda

title: EXCLUSIVE: Berekum Chelsea transfer Hearts-target Latif Salifu to Ivorian champions AS Tanda
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 17:25 CET EXCLUSIVE: Berekum Chelsea transfer Hearts-target Latif Salifu to Ivorian champions AS Tanda 
Berekum Chelsea have reached a deal to sell talented midfielder Latif Salifu to Ivorian champions AS Tanda, GHANASoccernet.com can exclusively reveal. 
The 25-year-old has joined the Zanzan region-based side for an undisclosed fee. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
